TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConnectionPoint extends System.Object

summary.span: 用作定义连接点对象的基类，这些对象使 Web 部件连接中的使用者控件和提供者控件可以共享数据。

span.span: Serves as the base class for defining connection point objects that enable the consumer control and the provider control in a Web Parts connection to share data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 部件连接由两个共享数据的服务器控件组成： 一个控件是使用者，另一个是提供程序。Every Web Parts connection consists of two server controls sharing data: one control is the consumer, the other is the provider. Web 部件连接中和连接对象本身的基本组件的讨论，请参阅类概述。For a discussion of the essential components of a Web Parts connection, and the connection object itself, see the class overview. 每个 Web 部件连接需要连接点。Every Web Parts connection requires connection points. 提供程序和使用者控件都必须具有至少一个定义可以共享包含如何控件可以与另一个控件的数据类型将其连接的详细信息的对象 （其中每个可根据需要多个连接点）。The provider and the consumer control must each have at least one defined object (each of them can optionally have multiple connection points) that contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share. 在实际的连接中，提供程序具有其自己的连接点对象类型 (派生自基本类)、 一个实例和使用者具有其自己的对象，实例。In an actual connection, the provider has its own type of connection point object (derived from the base class), a instance, and the consumer has its own object, a instance. 若要创建的提供程序连接点，开发人员必须添加到的提供程序将返回向使用者的实现的接口实例的回调方法。To create a provider connection point, developers must add a callback method to the provider that will return an implemented interface instance to a consumer. 它们必须标记与源代码中的回调方法`ConnectionProvider`代码属性 (请参阅类)。They must mark the callback method in the source code with a `ConnectionProvider` code attribute (see the class). 同样，若要创建使用者连接点，开发人员必须将方法添加到使用者来接收接口实例，并且它们必须标记该方法以`ConnectionConsumer`属性 (请参阅类)。Similarly, to create a consumer connection point, developers must add a method to the consumer that receives an interface instance, and they must mark that method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute (see the class). 当开发人员创建连接到 Web 页上时，则可以创建为静态或动态连接它们。When developers create connections on a Web page, they can be created as static or dynamic connections. 在 Web 页的标记中声明静态连接。Static connections are declared in the markup of a Web page. 当声明静态连接时，开发人员可以将指定的使用者和提供程序使用的连接点，应将值赋给`ProviderConnectionPointID`和`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性内``元素标记。When a static connection is declared, developers can designate which connection points are used for both the consumer and provider by assigning values to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` and `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attributes within the `` element tag. 这种方法是特别有用，如果有多个连接点定义中的使用者和提供程序控件中，因为它允许静态连接以确定要用于连接的连接点。This approach is especially useful if there are multiple connection points defined within the consumer and provider controls, because it enables the static connection to identify which connection points to use for the connection. 由开发人员的代码或由用户通过提供用户界面 (UI) 中，以编程方式创建动态连接控件。Dynamic connections are created programmatically, either by a developer's code or by users through the user interface (UI) provided by the control. 若要在代码中创建的连接，开发人员必须获取的实例对象通过调用方法控件。To create a connection in code, developers must get an instance of a object by calling the method on the control. 它们可以调用此方法之前，开发人员必须对使用者和提供程序服务器控件和及其各自的连接点对象的引用。Before they can call this method, developers must have references to the consumer and provider server controls and their respective connection point objects. 若要获取的连接点对引用的提供程序和使用者控件，开发人员第一次调用和方法控件。To get references to the connection points for a provider and a consumer control, developers first call the and methods on the control. 这些方法返回适当的连接点对象，反过来可以传递到方法，以创建连接。These methods return the appropriate connection point objects, which in turn can be passed to the method for creating a connection. 当提供者和使用者的连接点对象均使用相同类型的接口，它们是兼容，并且可以构成直接连接来共享数据。When the provider's and the consumer's connection point objects both work with the same type of interface, they are compatible and can form a direct connection to share data. 如果它们不能使用相同的接口类型、对象必须用于将转换为类型使用者可用于从提供程序接口实例。If they do not work with the same interface type, a object must be used to translate the interface instance from the provider into a type that the consumer can work with. 抽象类提供由使用者和提供程序的控件共享的连接点的基本详细信息。The abstract class provides the base details of connection points that are shared by both consumer and provider controls. 多个属性包含这些详细信息。Several properties contain these details. 属性指示连接点可以参与多个连接一次。The property indicates whether a connection point can participate in more than one connection at a time. 默认情况下，提供程序连接点可以参与多个连接，并使用者连接点不能。By default, provider connection points can participate in multiple connections, and consumer connection points cannot. 属性指示与连接点关联的服务器控件的类型。The property indicates the type of the server control associated with a connection point. 请注意该不但控件可以形成连接; 所有服务器控件，无论是 ASP.NET 控件、 一个自定义控件或用户控件，可以都启用参与连接，如果置于区域。Note that not only controls can form connections; any server control, whether an ASP.NET control, a custom control, or a user control, can be enabled to participate in connections if placed in a zone. 属性提供可以用于帮助创建连接的用户的 UI 中显示的连接点的友好名称。The property provides a friendly name for the connection point that can be displayed in the UI to assist users who are creating connections. 属性将作为连接点对象本身的字符串标识符。The property serves as a string identifier for the connection point object itself. 属性指示哪种类型的接口实例的连接点理解。The property indicates what type of interface instance the connection point understands. 由给定的连接点是否提供或使用该接口的实例是或对象。Whether a given connection point provides or consumes an instance of that interface is determined by whether it is a or a object. 该类具有一个方法。The class has one method. 方法返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否当前能够参与连接的连接点。The method returns a Boolean value indicating whether a connection point is currently able to participate in connections. 类还具有一个公共字段， 。The class also has one public field, . 此字段包含用来标识连接中的默认连接点的值。This field contains a value used to identify the default connection point in a connection. > [!NOTE] > 指定连接点方法具有只有一个所需的参数的属性`displayName`，因此可以创建默认连接点属性，无需指定一个 id。The attributes for specifying connection point methods have only one required parameter, `displayName`, so it is possible to create the default connection point attribute without specifying an ID. 在这种情况下，字段提供要使用的基值。In such cases, the field supplies a base value to use. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示创建包含所需的 Web 部件连接对象。The following code example demonstrates the creation of a Web Parts connection that includes the required objects. 因为类是一个抽象基类，实例及其子类-和-是以形成连接所使用的实际对象。Because the class is an abstract base class, instances of its child classes-- and --are the actual objects used to form a connection. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行该示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源文件包含名为一个简单的界面`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 此外，还有类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`，实现接口，并充当提供程序控制。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意，该方法将标有`ConnectionProvider`其元数据中的属性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于将方法标识为提供程序的连接点的回调方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并且它可作为连接的使用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类具有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法作为使用者的连接点方法标记为`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识使用者控件中的连接点方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指令用于注册构成该连接，自定义控件和用户控件，使用户能够更改显示在页面上的模式。Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page. 以声明方式内创建连接本身``页面上的元素。The connection itself is created declaratively within the `` element on the page. 你还可以以编程方式; 创建连接执行该操作的代码包含在`Button1_Click`方法。You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is contained in the `Button1_Click` method. 是否以声明方式或以编程方式创建连接，连接点必须始终指定与提供程序和使用者。Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer. `Button2_Click`方法访问对象提供程序和使用者，并将其属性值的一些写入到页中的标签。The `Button2_Click` method accesses the objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，单击**连接点详细信息**按钮。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button. 显示有关在声明性的连接中建立的提供程序和使用者连接点的信息。Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears. 接下来，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换到页连接模式。Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode. 谓词菜单中的其中一个控件 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），单击连接谓词。On the verbs menu of one of the controls (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 自动创建用户界面出现，连接``页面中声明的控件。The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `` control declared in the page. 单击**断开连接**按钮以终止现有的连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing connection. 使用**显示模式**控件来返回到浏览模式的页。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 接下来，单击**动态连接**按钮以编程方式创建连接。Next, click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically. 单击**连接点详细信息**按钮再次，指示两个连接点对象有关的详细信息。Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to indicate details about the two connection point objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowsMultipleConnections As Boolean
public: property bool AllowsMultipleConnections { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示连接点是否支持多个并发连接的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a connection point supports multiple simultaneous connections.

value.span: 如果连接点支持多个连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection point supports multiple connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象具有其属性值设置为`true`(通过类)，这是因为 Web 部件控件的默认设置启用多个使用者建立连接的提供程序连接点。 objects have their property value set to `true` (by the class), because the Web Parts control set by default enables provider connection points to form connections to multiple consumers. 与此相反，对象具有其属性值设置为`false`(通过类) 因为 Web 部件控件集默认情况下允许使用者连接点来建立与在一个提供程序的连接时间。In contrast, objects have their property value set to `false` (by the class) because the Web Parts control set by default allows consumer connection points to establish a connection to only one provider at a time. 你可以更改通过分配到不同的值有关的多个连接的默认行为属性 （对于提供程序） 或对两个属性 （对于使用者）用于连接属性的类。You can change the default behavior concerning multiple connections by assigning different values to the property (for providers) or the property (for consumers) on the two classes used for connection attributes. 如果启用了使用者连接点在同一时间连接到多个提供程序，你的代码必须处理的任何生成的同步问题。If you enable consumer connection points to connect to multiple providers at the same time, your code must deal with any resulting synchronization issues. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性同时和对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 此代码示例演示只有 Web 页包含的代码访问您的属性。有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button2_Click`网页访问方法在每个连接点上的属性对象，并将写入一个标签的每个值。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 通过单击执行代码**连接点详细信息**按钮后在浏览器中加载页面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ControlType As Type
public: property Type ^ ControlType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取连接点与之关联的服务器控件的 。

span.span: Gets the of the server control with which a connection point is associated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性通常是类型。The value of the property is often the type. 但是，因为任何类型的用户控件或服务器控件可以参与连接，如果已正确启用并放入区域，属性可以返回以下类型之一的其他服务器控件以及。However, because any type of user control or server control can participate in connections if it is properly enabled and placed in a zone, the property can return one of these other server control types as well. 在服务器控件时不控件都将置于区域，它们的包装与对象在运行时，因此它们可以用作控制和参与连接。When server controls that are not controls are placed in a zone, they are wrapped with a object at run time so they can function as controls and participate in connections. 但在连接中，当涉及此类控件时属性值不返回键入; 它将返回的一种对象的子控件，这是服务器或用户控件的类型。But when such controls are involved in connections, the property value does not return the type; it returns the type of the object's child control, which is the type of the server or user control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性同时和对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 此代码示例演示只有 Web 页包含的代码访问您的属性。有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button2_Click`网页访问方法在每个连接点上的属性对象，并将写入一个标签的每个值。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 通过单击执行代码**连接点详细信息**按钮后在浏览器中加载页面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DefaultID As String

summary.span: 表示一个字符串，该字符串用于标识与服务器控件关联的连接点集合中的默认连接点。

span.span: Represents a string used to identify the default connection point within a collection of connection points associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建连接点时，有可能在使用者或提供程序的源代码中指定的连接点的 ID控件，并使用或属性。When a connection point is created, it is possible to specify an ID for the connection point in the source code of a consumer or provider control, using a or a attribute. 但是，属性添加到源代码中的连接点`ID`参数是可选的。However, when an attribute is added to a connection point in the source code, the `ID` parameter is optional. 如果在属性中，在未指定 ID字段提供用于标识默认连接点的字符串。If the ID is not specified in the attribute, the field provides a string that is used to identify the default connection point. 如果使用者或提供程序的控件中定义多个连接点，则需要指定每个连接点的 ID，以便创建连接时可以区分连接点。If multiple connection points are defined in a consumer or provider control, it is necessary to specify an ID for each connection point, so that the connection points can be distinguished when creating connections.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串用作在用户界面 (UI) 中表示连接点的友好显示名称。

span.span: Gets a string that serves as a friendly display name to represent a connection point in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 一个字符串，包含 对象的友好显示名称。

span.span: A string that contains a friendly display name for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 Web 部件连接中，连接的提供程序和使用者控件必须每个指定至少一个连接点，使他们能够进行通信和共享数据的方法。To create a Web Parts connection, the provider and consumer controls for the connection must each specify at least one connection point, a method that enables them to communicate and share data. 若要标识这些连接点方法，开发人员时，可指定属性上的所选的方法。To identify these connection point methods, a developer specifies an attribute on the selected methods. 在提供程序，`ConnectionProvider`属性设置在所选的回调方法和使用者，`ConnectionConsumer`接收包含从提供程序的数据接口的实例的方法上设置特性。In the provider, a `ConnectionProvider` attribute is set on the selected callback method, and in the consumer, a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute is set on the method that receives an instance of an interface that contains data from the provider. 对于以上两种属性，始终是必需的无论声明的重载以创建该特性的一个参数是`displayName`参数。For both of these attributes, the one parameter that is always required, regardless of which overload is declared to create the attribute, is the `displayName` parameter. 开发人员必须分配要用作连接点的友好显示名称的字符串，该字符串将成为的值属性。The developer must assign a string to be used as a friendly display name for the connection point, and that string becomes the value of the property. UI 中的网页上显示属性值，当用户创建连接。The property value is displayed in the UI of a Web page when users create connections. 例如，当控件添加到页上，它为创建一个 UI 控件之间创建连接的用户。For example, when the control is added to the page, it creates a UI for users to create connections between controls. 用户将页切换为连接的显示模式，并单击连接谓词后控制，UI 显示方式的连接。After a user switches a page into connect display mode and clicks a connect verb on a control, the connection UI appears. 可以参与连接每个控件列出在 UI 中，且每个控件旁边的下拉列表控件，显示其可用的连接点的友好名称。Each control that can participate in a connection is listed in the UI, and next to each control is a drop-down list control that displays the friendly names of its available connection points. 用户必须选择至少一个连接点才能建立连接。Users must select at least one connection point to establish a connection. 连接点列表中显示的值从获得属性。The values that appear in the list of connection points are obtained from the property. 如果开发人员构建自定义 UI 创建连接，他们可以使用中类似的方式来提供一个友好名称，表示连接点的属性。If developers build a custom UI for creating connections, they can use the property in a similar way to provide a friendly name that represents a connection point.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetEnabled(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 一个与连接点关联的 或其他服务器控件。

span.span: A or other server control that is associated with a connection point.

summary.span: 返回一个指示连接点是否可以参与连接的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a connection point can participate in connections.

returns.span: 如果控件可以创建连接点来参与连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control can create a connection point to participate in a connection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类中的方法类始终返回`true`，但派生的类可以重写该方法以返回`true`或`false`在不同时间基于状态`control`。The method in the base class always returns `true`, but derived classes can override the method to return `true` or `false` at different times, based on the state of `control`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法同时和对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method on both and objects. 此代码示例演示只有 Web 页包含的代码访问您的属性。有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button2_Click`网页访问方法方法上每个连接点对象，并将写入一个标签的每个值。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the method on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 通过单击执行代码**连接点详细信息**按钮后在浏览器中加载页面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含连接点的标识符的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the identifier for a connection point.

value.span: 包含连接点的标识符的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier for a connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当开发人员声明或属性上的控件的源代码中的方法，以便该方法可以用作连接点，它不需要声明`ID`连接点属性的参数。When a developer declares a or a attribute on a method in the source code of a control, so that the method can be used as a connection point, it is not required to declare the `ID` parameter for the connection point attribute. 唯一必需的特性是`displayName`参数。The only required attribute is the `displayName` parameter. 默认 ID 分配给连接点，则使用的值字段。A default ID is assigned to the connection point, using the value from the field. 如果在作为连接点正在使用的控件中没有只有一个方法，则不必指定连接点的 ID。If there is only one method in a control being used as a connection point, it is unnecessary to specify an ID for the connection point. 如果有多个方法指定为连接点，则必须指定每个; 的 ID否则，将引发异常。If there are multiple methods specified as connection points, you must specify an ID for each one; otherwise, an exception will be thrown. 通过给每个连接点分配一个 ID，你还能够指定声明在网页中的连接或在代码中创建它们时要使用的连接点。By assigning an ID to each connection point, you also make it possible to specify which connection point to use when you declare connections in Web pages or create them in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性同时和对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 此代码示例演示只有 Web 页包含的代码访问您的属性。有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button2_Click`网页访问方法在每个连接点上的属性对象，并将写入一个标签的每个值。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 通过单击执行代码**连接点详细信息**按钮后在浏览器中加载页面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InterfaceType As Type
public: property Type ^ InterfaceType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取连接点所使用的接口的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the interface used by a connection point.

value.span: 与控件所提供或使用的接口类型相对应的 。

span.span: A that corresponds to the interface type provided or consumed by a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示哪种类型的接口的连接点使用。The property indicates what type of interface a connection point uses. 这可以帮助以确定两个控件是否兼容，并且能够形成连接。This can help to determine whether two controls are compatible and able to form a connection. 如果提供程序连接点不同于使用者连接点，则这两个控件将不兼容 （这意味着，它们不能直接连接而无需转换器），和一个对象必须用于建立连接。If the provider connection point's is different from the consumer connection point's , then the two controls are incompatible (meaning that they cannot be directly connected without a transformer), and a object must be used to establish a connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性同时和对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 此代码示例演示只有 Web 页包含的代码访问您的属性。有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button2_Click`网页访问方法在每个连接点上的属性对象，并将写入一个标签的每个值。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 通过单击执行代码**连接点详细信息**按钮后在浏览器中加载页面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]
